trainers.name: Norman Victor
trainers.description: Norman has been associated with fitness for more than two decades today, A highly experienced, innovative and intelligent operator, Maurice went on to manage at Bodywise Fitness Centre in the mid 1990s, later starting and developing the fitness for life programme, which was highly successful and acclaimed. Maurice is the lead instructor and team leader at Zarnash, from inception to date. He was also the first chair of AFIA-K (Aerobics fitness & instructors Association of Kenya) the first and only association registered by Health and fitness professional in Kenya, and also served as Secretary, for 2 years, of Kenya Professional Body Builders Association (KPBBA). Maurice is trained and certified bodies from United Kingdom, the United States of America & South Africa.
trainers.title: Team Leader/Senior Consultant

trainers.name: Elva Pili
trainers.description: Elva Pill has been associated with fitness for more than two decades today, A highly experienced, innovative and intelligent operator, Maurice went on to manage at Bodywise Fitness Centre in the mid 1990s, later starting and developing the fitness for life programme, which was highly successful and acclaimed. Eric Omondi is one of the most valuable additions to the team. Having joined the team in 2007, Erick has risen fast through the ranks due to hard work, discipline and a passionate dedication to the course of fitness. He brings unbridled team spirit, energy and result-based attitude that has proved a big boost to the team. Erick is a professional trainer with certification from Bodywise Training Centre among others and previously worked for highly visible and competitive health clubs including Impala Sports Club, home of the acclaimed Safari Sevens Rugby.
trainers.title: Senior Trainer

trainers.title: Trainer

trainers.name: Berthild Josephine
trainers.description: Berthild Josephine  is a passionate fitness trainer and enthusiast who for many years participated in the highly exciting and disciplined Kenya Bodybuilding Federation contests, scooping the top Honors in different categories. Abdul went on to Manager several top Health clubs with distinction, including; Bodywise Fitness Centre, Riverside Health and Fitness Centre, The Grand Regency Health club, the Norfolk Hotel Health Club, and Hilton Hotel Health Club among others Abdul Joined Zarnash as a senior Trainer and consultant in 2004, and has been a highly valued professional and team member. Abdul is also a professional fitness trainer certified by Royal School of Art (RSA), London
trainers.title: Associate Trainer
